articles.content:

articles.title: NASA Releases Its Clearest Mars Images Yet - 140 Million Miles Away, And Everyone’s Noticing The Same Strange Thing
articles.description: NASA's Curiosity rover has released mind-blowing images of Mars that are shaking up the internet. With stunning detail from 140 million miles away, these visuals are unlike anything we've seen before. The unexpected clarity has sparked a flood of reactions and comparisons.
articles.content: A recent release of images from NASA’s Curiosity rover has taken the internet by storm. While the footage dates back to 2015, it’s only now, after years of silence, that the stunning 360-degree panorama has captured the public’s imagination. The imag... [3899 chars]

articles.title: Politicians, lawyers and doctors express concern over use of expert witnesses in English courts
articles.description: Questions raised about potential miscarriages of justice after use of such experts criticised in Lucy Letby and Post Office Horizon cases
articles.content:

articles.title: One million Australians missing specialist doctor appointments due to cost, report finds
articles.description: Grattan Institute finds one in 10 Australians now paying $600 a year for specialist appointments
articles.content:
One in 10 Australians pay almost $600 each year to see specialist doctors, with 1 million delaying or skipping appointments due to the cost, according to new analysis.

articles.title: Pakistan says 450 pilgrims evacuated from Iran amid ongoing Israeli attacks
articles.description: ISLAMABAD: Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister Ishaq Dar said on Sunday that Islamabad has facilitated the evacuation of 450 pilgrims from Iran and is making further arrangements to evacuate Pakistani students in the neighboring country, amid ongoing attacks by Israel.
